message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $95. I think it's a great deal for both of us.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand your position, but $85 is still a bit lower than I'm comfortable with.  How about we split the difference and go with $90?  It's a fair price considering the value of the product for you.

I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about we try $87.50? I think that's a fair price considering the value of the product for me.

Bob,  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $87.50 is still a bit below what I'm hoping for. I'm willing to come down to $89.  This is a fair price considering the value you place on the product and I think it will be mutually beneficial.  Let's reach an agreement on this one.

I understand your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with $89. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about we try $88? I think that's a fair price considering the value of the product for me.

Bob, I see your point, but $88 is still a bit too low for me.  Considering the value of the product and how much time we've spent negotiating, I'm willing to meet you in the middle again at $88.50.  This is my final offer. Let's get this done!

I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with $88.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about we try $87? I think that's a fair price considering the value of the product for me.
